column2: Bribed Serf
Serfs can be paid for other services: information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Influenced Kulak
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: an important Kulak, his underlings and his access to the countryside has come under your control.
Controlled Farms
A large number of farms have come under your control.
Ghouled Publican
You have ghouled a Publican who runs an important pub in the countryside.
Conditioned Farmers
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all the various serfs in the countryside.
Bribed Woodsman
Woodsman can be paid for other services: information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Influenced Lumberjack
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: an important Lumberjack, his underlings and his access to the forest has come under your control.
Controlled Forests
A large number of lumber operations have come under your control.
Ghouled Sawboss
You have ghouled an important Sawboss who holds a lot of sway in the surrounding forest.
Conditioned Lumberjacks
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all the various lumberjacks in the surrounding forest.
Bribed Miner
Miners can be paid for other services: information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Influenced Mine Foreman
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: an important Mine Foreman, his underlings and his access to the mines has come under your control.
Controlled Mines
A large number of mines have come under your control.
Ghouled Mine Boss
You have ghouled an important Mine Boss who holds a lot of sway in the surrounding mines.
Conditioned Miners
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all the various miners in the surrounding mines.
Bribed Caravaner
Caravaners can be paid for other services: information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Influenced Caravan Guard
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: an important Caravan Guard, his underlings and his access to the caravans has come under your control.
Controlled Caravans
A large number of caravans have come under your control.
Ghouled Merchant
You have ghouled an important Merchant who holds a lot of sway with the caravans in the area.
Conditioned Caravan
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all of a caravan outfit based in the area.
Basic Flesh Lab
A basic Flesh Lab with just enough resources to create a handful of war szlachta.
Small Flesh Lab
A small Flesh Lab that has adequate resources to create a number of war szlachta.
Large Flesh Lab
A large Flesh Lab that has trained assistants and resources to produce many war szlachta.
Ghouled Assistant
You have ghouled an assistant to provide better oversight and improve szlachta creation.
Masterful Flesh Lab
Your mastery of Vicissitude and experience producing szlachta led you to create new equipment and techniques.  This allows you to produce szlachta at an astounding pace.
